attributes.action: bring home the troops to protect his country from terrorists. Denying that Iraq has anything to do with attacks in this country is one  distorted opinion but in terms of logistics if the money spent on the war had been added to the £2 billion already spent on anti-terrorism activities with the soldiers (including the 160 that died) able to help then maybe we would all have felt safer and perhaps have prevented the recent terrorist disruptions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
